title: Bug 102436 - Date/time value not stored correctly in report design
description: When attempting to store a date/time value in a report design, if the value provided is an invalid date/time string (i.e. it does not conform to a universal format or the system default locale format), it is currently not being rejected. This bug report is to address this issue and ensure that invalid date/time values are rejected.
OB: When attempting to store an invalid date/time string in a report design, the system does not reject the value and allows it to be saved.
EB: The date value should have been validated by both the UI and the Model. If an invalid date/time string is provided, the system should reject it and show an error message indicating that the value is not valid.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the report design form.
2. Enter an invalid date/time string in any of the date/time fields.
3. Save the form.

Expected result:
- The system should validate the date/time value and reject it, showing an error message indicating that the value is not valid.
